summary: Both REQ-1 and REQ-2 are substantially implemented. REQ-1 teacher removal is complete across frontend components and backend. REQ-2 UPI QR code is displayed with correct UPI ID and label. One minor AC for REQ-1 regarding the /teacher-dashboard route is partially addressed (page shows a redirect message but route still exists). The QR code image path uses a generated asset path but cannot confirm the actual image file was added as a static asset.

missing_requirements.requirement: The /teacher-dashboard route is removed or redirects away
missing_requirements.reason: The TeacherDashboard page still exists as a component showing a 'Page Not Available' message. App.tsx summary mentions the route was removed, but the file itself was not removed. App.tsx is truncated so full confirmation is not possible.

missing_requirements.requirement: The QR code image is served from frontend/public/assets/generated/
missing_requirements.reason: Donation.tsx references the image at '/assets/generated/upi-qr.dim_300x300.png', but no actual image file addition is shown in the diff. The diff lists 'Added: 1' file but that is backend/migration.mo, not the QR image asset.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend migration module (migration.mo) added to handle removing teacher roles from existing data
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only mentions removing the Teacher role from the frontend and ensuring no backend calls reference the Teacher role. A full migration module for transforming existing backend state was not requested.
